content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 1/3 cups whole wheat bread flour" )

content.text: 0) Place all ingredients (except sunflower seeds) in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "all ingredients (except sunflower seeds)"@9:49 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
			:ref ( ing-5 )
			:ref ( ing-6 )
			:ref ( ing-7 )
		)
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "the pan of the bread machine"@53:81 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Select basic white cycle; press start.
2) Add the sunflower seeds when the alert sounds during the knead cycle.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "the sunflower seeds"@7:26 / FOOD )
		:when ( cond-2-0 "when the alert sounds during the knead cycle"@27:71 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
